mapper.insert: INSERT INTO study_team_task ( team_id, task_name, task_desc, task_type, target_value, target_unit, repeat_type, repeat_days, require_content, require_image, start_date, end_date, status, create_by, create_time, update_time ) VALUES ( #{teamId}, #{taskName}, #{taskDesc}, #{taskType}, #{targetValue}, #{targetUnit}, #{repeatType}, #{repeatDays}, #{requireContent}, #{requireImage}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{status}, #{createBy}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE study_team_task SET task_name = #{taskName}, task_desc = #{taskDesc}, task_type = #{taskType}, target_value = #{targetValue}, target_unit = #{targetUnit}, repeat_type = #{repeatType}, repeat_days = #{repeatDays}, require_content = #{requireContent}, require_image = #{requireImage}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM study_team_task WHERE id = #{id} AND is_deleted = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE study_team_task SET is_deleted = 1, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE study_team_task SET status = #{status}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.team_id, t.task_name, t.task_desc, t.task_type, t.target_value, t.target_unit, t.repeat_type, t.repeat_days, t.require_content, t.require_image, t.start_date, t.end_date, t.status, t.create_time, t.create_by FROM study_team_task t WHERE t.id = #{taskId} AND t.is_deleted = 0

SELECT t.id, t.team_id, t.task_name, t.task_desc, t.task_type, t.target_value, t.target_unit, t.repeat_type, t.repeat_days, t.require_content, t.require_image, t.start_date, t.end_date, t.status, t.create_time, t.create_by FROM study_team_task t WHERE t.team_id = #{teamId} AND t.is_deleted = 0 AND t.status = 1 AND (t.start_date IS NULL OR t.start_date <= #{today}) AND (t.end_date IS NULL OR t.end_date >= #{today}) AND ( t.repeat_type = 1 OR (t.repeat_type = 2 AND #{dayOfWeek} BETWEEN 1 AND 5) OR (t.repeat_type = 3 AND FIND_IN_SET(#{dayOfWeek}, t.repeat_days) > 0) ) ORDER BY t.create_time DESC
